excerpt.zh: 这是我的第一篇博客文章，在这里我会分享我的学习经历、技术心得和生活感悟。欢迎大家关注！
excerpt.en: This is my first blog post where I will share my learning experiences, technical insights, and life reflections. Welcome to follow!

title.zh: Python入门教程 - 从零开始学Python
title.en: Python Beginner's Guide - Learn Python from Scratch

excerpt.zh: Python是一门非常适合初学者的编程语言，本文将带你从零开始学习Python的基础知识。
excerpt.en: Python is an excellent programming language for beginners. This article will guide you from zero to basics of Python programming.

excerpt.zh: 深度学习是当前人工智能领域最热门的技术之一。本文将介绍深度学习的基本概念和常用框架。
excerpt.en: Deep Learning is one of the hottest technologies in AI today. This article introduces fundamental concepts and popular frameworks.

excerpt.zh: 在大学期间，我总结了一套适合自己的学习方法。今天想和大家分享一下我的学习经验。
excerpt.en: During my university years, I developed a study method that works well for me. I'd like to share my learning experience with you.

excerpt.zh: 2025年即将结束，回顾这一年的经历，有收获也有遗憾。在这里记录下我的思考和感悟。
excerpt.en: As 2025 comes to an end, I reflect on this year filled with gains and regrets. Here I document my thoughts and insights.

title.zh: 深度学习与计算机视觉：前言
title.en: Deep Learning and Computer Vision: Introduction

title.zh: 深度学习与计算机视觉：最近邻分类器
title.en: Deep Learning and Computer Vision: Nearest Neighbor Classifier

excerpt.zh: 什么是机器学习？最近邻分类器的基本原理和实现方法是什么？
excerpt.en: What is Machine Learning? What are the basic principles and implementation methods of the Nearest Neighbor Classifier?

title.zh: 深度学习与计算机视觉：线性分类器
title.en: Deep Learning and Computer Vision: Linear Classifier

excerpt.zh: 什么是线性分类器？线性分类器的基本原理和实现方法是什么？
excerpt.en: What is a Linear Classifier? What are the basic principles and implementation methods of a Linear Classifier?

title.zh: 深度学习与计算机视觉：正则化与优化
title.en: Deep Learning and Computer Vision: Regularization and Optimization

excerpt.zh: 什么是正则化？优化算法的基本原理和实现方法是什么？
excerpt.en: What is Regularization? What are the basic principles and implementation methods of Optimization Algorithms?

title.zh: 深度学习与计算机视觉：神经网络
title.en: Deep Learning and Computer Vision: Neural Networks

excerpt.zh: 什么是神经网络？为什么要从线性分类器过渡到神经网络？
excerpt.en: What is a Neural Network? Why do we transition from Linear Classifiers to Neural Networks?

title.zh: 深度学习与计算机视觉：反向传播
title.en: Deep Learning and Computer Vision: Backpropagation

excerpt.zh: 什么是反向传播算法？它是如何计算神经网络中每个参数的梯度的？
excerpt.en: What is the Backpropagation Algorithm? How does it compute the gradients of each parameter in a Neural Network?
